Learn more about the origin of the last name Nagy-toth

The meaning and origin of the last name Nagy-toth

Nagy Toth is a Hungarian surname that often combines two common Hungarian surnames, "Nagy" meaning "big" or "great" and "Toth" meaning "Slovak" or "from Slovakia". The surname likely originated from individuals who were of Slovak descent and held a prominent or important position within their community. The combination of these two surnames may indicate a person who was of great importance or influence among the Slovak community in Hungary. The surname Nagy Toth is still commonly found in Hungary and among Hungarian communities around the world, serving as a reminder of the diverse cultural influences within Hungarian society.

Geographical distribution of the last name Nagy-toth

Nagy Toth is a surname that is predominantly found in Hungary, where it is a common Hungarian surname. The name Nagy Toth is a combination of two separate surnames, "Nagy" meaning "big" or "great" in Hungarian, and "Toth" which refers to the historical group of people known as the "Toth" or "Slovak" people who inhabited areas of present-day Hungary. The geographical distribution of the last name Nagy Toth is still largely centered in Hungary, particularly in regions where the Toth people historically lived. However, due to migration patterns and globalization, individuals with the surname Nagy Toth can also be found in other countries with Hungarian diaspora communities, such as the United States, Canada, and other parts of Europe. Overall, Nagy Toth is a surname with a strong connection to Hungarian heritage and history.

Variants and spellings of the last name Nagy-toth

Nagy Toth is a Hungarian last name that may have several variations and spellings. Some common variations include Nagy-Toth, Toth-Nagy, and Tothnagy. Nagy is a common Hungarian surname meaning "big" or "great", while Toth is a surname of Slovak origin meaning "Slav". Therefore, the combination of Nagy Toth could signify someone of Hungarian-Slovak descent. Other possible spellings of Nagy Toth could include Nagy TÃ³th, Nagy-Toth, or even Toth-Nagy. These variations may have originated from different regions of Hungary or from different branches of the same family. Regardless of the exact spelling, Nagy Toth is a unique and distinctive last name with a rich cultural history.
